word: Those whom God employs to do service for Him, He would have fitted in His way for that service. Those who preach Christ must learn of Christ daily, in order to understand the mystery of saving and serving the souls for whom He has died. . . . They must pattern after Him in all things, sharing His tender compassion and His sternness against all evil working.--Letter 53, Feb. 2, 1905, to two leading workers at the newly established Paradise Valley Sanitarium.
